about_the_game:
Dungeon of Erotic Master Plus Demo

Upon completing the demo version, you can create a save file to carry over into the full version of the game.

・You can play the first half of the "Monster Dungeon" (the first dungeon) in the demo version.
・When you transfer your save data from the demo version to the full version, you will be able to pick up from where you left off in the story, but your party will be reset to Lv. 1. Any items obtained in the Monster Dungeon will be lost.
・You can play the second half of the Monster Dungeon as postgame content after clearing the full version of the game.


Explore the dungeons and acquire maps with these beautiful warriors.
Grow stronger in battle alongside all-new girls.
Gain lots of experience and face powerful enemies!
It's time to set off on your adventure!


This is a pseudo-3D dungeon/animation RPG.
Fun even for players who struggle with dungeon crawlers.
The automap and mini-map are displayed at all times.


  • Playable using a game pad.

*Rushimarudo is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please contact Tensei Games.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace: suggestive clothing, sexual themes.

detailed_description:
Dungeon of Erotic Master Plus Demo

Upon completing the demo version, you can create a save file to carry over into the full version of the game.

・You can play the first half of the "Monster Dungeon" (the first dungeon) in the demo version.
・When you transfer your save data from the demo version to the full version, you will be able to pick up from where you left off in the story, but your party will be reset to Lv. 1. Any items obtained in the Monster Dungeon will be lost.
・You can play the second half of the Monster Dungeon as postgame content after clearing the full version of the game.


Explore the dungeons and acquire maps with these beautiful warriors.
Grow stronger in battle alongside all-new girls.
Gain lots of experience and face powerful enemies!
It's time to set off on your adventure!


This is a pseudo-3D dungeon/animation RPG.
Fun even for players who struggle with dungeon crawlers.
The automap and mini-map are displayed at all times.


  • Playable using a game pad.

*Rushimarudo is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please contact Tensei Games.
name: Dungeon of Erotic Master Plus Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is the demo version of Dungeon of Erotic Master Plus. Save data can be carried over to the full version of the game.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
